short_summary: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has identified a requirement for Recruitment of an external project monitor for projects: Adaptation and Valorization of Entrepreneurship in Irrigated Agriculture (AVENIR), Resilient Women and Agriculture (FAR) and Improving Access to Agricultural Insurance in the Casamance Region in Senegal (RESILIENCE).
